<S%H3588>"When<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> and <S%H4603>acts<s%> <S%H4604>unfaithfully<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3584>deceives<s%> his <S%H5997>companion<s%> in regard to a <S%H6487>deposit<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H8667>security<s%> <S%H3027>entrusted<s%> [to him], <S%H176>or<s%> through <S%H1498>robbery,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> [if] he has <S%H6231>extorted<s%> from his <S%H5997>companion,<s%>

<S%H176>or<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> what was lost and <S%H9>lied<s%> about it and <S%H9>sworn<s%> <S%H3584>falsely,<s%> so that he <S%H7650>sins<s%> in <S%H8267>regard<s%> to <S%H2398>any<s%> <S%H5921>one<s%> of the things a <S%H259>man<s%> may <S%H3605>do;<s%>

then it shall be, <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H2398>sins<s%> and <S%H816>becomes<s%> <S%H816>guilty,<s%> that he shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H1497>took<s%> by <S%H1497>robbery,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6231>got<s%> by <S%H6233>extortion,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H6487>deposit<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H6485>entrusted<s%> to him, <S%H176>or<s%> the lost thing <S%H9>which<s%> he <S%H9>found,<s%>

<S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> about <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> <S%H8267>falsely;<s%> he shall <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution<s%> for it in <S%H7218>full,<s%> and <S%H3254>add<s%> to it one-fifth <S%H3254>more.<s%> He shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the one to <S%H834>whom<s%> it belongs on the <S%H3117>day<s%> [he presents] his <S%H819>guilt<s%> <S%H819>offering.<s%>

"Then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> his <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>valuation,<s%> for a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and he shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> for <S%H259>any<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the things <S%H834>which<s%> he may have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H819>incur<s%> <S%H819>guilt.<s%> "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering:<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H1931>itself<s%> [shall remain] on the <S%H4169>hearth<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> is to be kept <S%H3344>burning<s%> on it.

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> is to <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4055>robe,<s%> and he shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H4370>undergarments<s%> <S%H5921>next<s%> to his <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and he shall <S%H7311>take<s%> up the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> [to] <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>reduces<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7760>place<s%> them <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'Then he shall <S%H6584>take<s%> <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H899>garments<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3318>carry<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

'And the <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be kept <S%H3344>burning<s%> on it. It shall not <S%H3518>go<s%> out, but the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> on it <S%H1242>every<s%> <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and he shall <S%H6186>lay<s%> out the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> on it, and <S%H6999>offer<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H2459>portions<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> on it.
<S%H784>'Fire<s%> shall be kept <S%H3344>burning<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> it is not to <S%H3518>go<s%> out.

'Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the grain <S%H4503>offering:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>present<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'Then one [of them] shall <S%H7311>lift<s%> up from it a <S%H7062>handful<s%> of the <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> of the grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> with its <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3828>incense<s%> that is on the grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and he shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> [it] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> as its <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H234>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And what is <S%H3498>left<s%> of it <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> are to <S%H398>eat.<s%> It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> as <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>cakes<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> they are to <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

'It shall not be <S%H644>baked<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven.<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it as their <S%H2506>share<s%> from My <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire;<s%> it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> like the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> it; it is a <S%H5769>permanent<s%> <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> from the <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H3605>Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall <S%H6942>become<s%> <S%H6942>consecrated.<s%>' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> are to <S%H7126>present<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he is <S%H4886>anointed;<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> as a <S%H8548>regular<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> of it in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H4276>half<s%> of it in the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

"It shall be <S%H6213>prepared<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> on a <S%H4227>griddle.<s%> When it is [well] <S%H7246>stirred,<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it. You shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> in <S%H8601>baked<s%> <S%H6595>pieces<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> who will be in his <S%H8478>place<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> it. By a <S%H5769>permanent<s%> <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> it shall be <S%H3632>entirely<s%> <S%H6999>offered<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"So <S%H3605>every<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H3632>burned<s%> <S%H3632>entirely.<s%> It shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering:<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> is <S%H7819>slain<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> shall be <S%H7819>slain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

'The <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H2398>offers<s%> it for <S%H2398>sin<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it. It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Anyone<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H6942>become<s%> <S%H6942>consecrated;<s%> and <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5137>splashes<s%> on a <S%H899>garment,<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> you shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> was <S%H5137>splashed<s%> on.

'Also the <S%H2789>earthenware<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> it was <S%H1310>boiled<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> it was <S%H1310>boiled<s%> in a <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> then it shall be <S%H4838>scoured<s%> and <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water.<s%>
<S%H3605>'Every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of it; it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

'But <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place shall be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
